name: Spain Madrid
body: Madrid, Spain's central capital, is a city of elegant boulevards and expansive, manicured parks such as the Buen Retiro.

name: Italy
body: Italy, a European country with a long Mediterranean coastline, has left a powerful mark on Western culture and cuisine.

name: The United Kingdom
